snippet: For the Nottingham Panthers and Britain’s Elite League, it is a coup to have landed an active National Hockey League player, the Hurricanes’ Anthony Stewart.
abstract: Carolina Hurricanes forward Anthony Stewart signs temporary contract with the Nottingham Panthers in Britain's Elite League; many NHL players are joining league's across Europe during the lockout, in effort to remain in game-ready shape.

byline.contributor: Jeff Z. Klein contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: For the Nottingham Panthers and Britain’s Elite League, it is a coup to have landed an active National Hockey League player, the Hurricanes’ Anthony Stewart.

headline.seo: Locked-Out Hurricane Anthony Stewart Lands in Nottingham
headline.main: N.H.L. Player Becomes the Forward of Nottingham
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Player Becomes the Forward of Nottingham
